name: Bouncing Around
description:
Control the ball in a brick breaker game. Use the left and right arrow keys to move in the corresponding direction. Be careful not to fall past the paddle and be careful of the momentum of your bounce arguing with the direction you want to travel.

Assets Used:

Wispy Skybox by Mundus

Ball Pack by YounGen Tech

Cube World Brick Blocks- Proto Series by BitGem

Traffic Barrier by Ninjacupcake Indie Studio

TS Sounds by Mute Colossus

Free Music Tracks For Games by Rizwan Ashraf

69 Game Over Jingles Pack (Free) by The Muwee Collective

Magic Particle Systems Lite by Goldman Studio

Loop & Music Free by marching dream
